titleStmt.title: Tax Receipt
titleStmt.author: [Aurelius] Hermias alias Helladios [and - - -], trapezitai of the Oxyrhynchite nome

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [In the consulship] of our masters Diocletianus, [the father of the] kings, for the 10th time, and of Galerius [Valerius] Maximianus Augustus, for the 7th time. [Aurelius] Hermias(?) also called Helladios, former gymnasiarch(?), [and - - -] . . ., manager of the public bank of the Oxyrhynchite nome, [to Claudia(?)] Heliodora, greetings. You have paid to us(?) [into the] public bank [of the nome], on account [of the . . .] month September of the current [17th and] 5th year, four thousand [. . .] hundred and fifty drachmai, [equal 4*50 drachmai] . . .
